Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the hemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 12.9 and σ = 0.3. We randomly draw one person from this population. How high should the Hb of this person be at most to belong to the lowest 15% of the population? belong?

Answerlist
----------

* 11.8108
* 12.2693
* 12.5891
* 12.7462

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 11.8108: Incorrect
* 12.2693: Incorrect
* 12.5891: Correct
* 12.7462: Incorrect
